profile.title: Yɛdefo Ho Nsɛm
profile.mustLogin: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ mu ansa na wubehu nsiesie no.
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Kyerɛ tete kratafa ne nkyerɛaseɛ ka ho
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sɛkɛnd ansa na ebeyi no kɔ
profile.noPrivateKey: Prɔvate kɛyɛ bi nni saa efidie yi so a wobɛtumi asie.
profile.setBackupPassword: Hyɛ ehintasɛmfua ma wode bɛkyekyere wo backup:
profile.importSuccess: Wode prɔvate kɛyɛ abɛba efidie yi so.
profile.importFailed: Entumi amfa kɛyɛ no (ehintasɛmfua mfa anaa fael no abu).
profile.keysRotated: Woanya kɛyɛ foforo na wɔde public key asɔ so.
profile.importKey: Fa kɔ backup a wɔahyɛ-kode mu
profile.keyDisclaimer: Wo prɔvate kɛyɛ renfi efidie yi so. Twe nea wɔahyɛ-kode na fa so san kɔsi efidie foforo so.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Woyɛ Free—fa Awia/Anadwo no ntɛm no wɔ fam. Sɔre kɔ Upgrade na bue atɛm biara.
profile.backupDesc: Yɛ backups a wɔahyɛ-kode ma wo kɛyɛ, na san fa so si efidie foforo so na ɛnsynk.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Bu nkratoɔ ani fufuw no yɛ default
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Bu ani fufuw bere a app no mfa adwene
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ka me kyerɛ sɛ wɔakɔpi me nkratoɔ
profile.followHint: Wɔn anansesɛm bɛda wo Following mu sɛ wɔde audience Followers (anaa Public) bɛto.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Biribi kɔ awry wɔ sekhyɛn yi mu.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fa frɛ ne nkratoɔ a ɛreba kɔ wo fon/email a wɔasɛe mu. Nkratoɔ/frɛ a worekɔ tumi da wo Chatforia nɔma no so.
profile.errE164: Kyerɛw fon a ɛfata E.164 (te sɛ +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Paw atɔso baako (fon anaa email) kɔ so.
profile.errQuietHours: Dumdɔnhwerɛ no ɛsɛ sɛ ɛwɔ 0 ne 23 ntam.

chat.selectPrompt: Paw text anaa chat room bi na fi ase kasa
chat.emptySubtitle: Fa nkratoɔ kɔ na fi ase chat.

status.filesNote: Fael kɔ 5 pɛ. Ɛtɔ da 24h na efi mu.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Kɔ mu na sɛe wo nsiesie.

auth.headline: Banbɔ mu, wiase nyinaa nkratoɔ ne kyerɛase ntɛm
auth.description: End-to-end kɔda, AI kyerɛase, nkratoɔ a ɛyera, ne frɛ/video frɛ.

feature.privacy: Privacy-edi kan. Wo data yɛ wo dea.

auth.desktopTip: Wudi desktop so? Scan de wo fon fa app no.
auth.subhead: Pɔtee, kɔda, na ɛkyerɛ ase — ntɛm ara.
auth.tip: Wobetumi de Chatforia di dwuma wɔ afidie biara so—na kɔfa app no nso na nsa ka mu.
auth.scanHint: Scan na fa app no anaa bue wɔ wɛb browser.

footer.doNotSell: Mum mfa me infɔmehyɛn nto hɔ

home.title: Fie
home.subheader: Fa nkratoɔ kɔ na fi ase chat.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Twerɛ nkratoɔ ansa na wotumi fa kɔ

press.title: Amansan Media
press.contact: Sɛ wopɛ amanneɛ a, frɛ yɛn wɔ press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Sɛ wopɛ amanneɛ a, frɛ yɛn wɔ press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia yɛ kɔda mu messenger a ɛwɔ kyerɛase ntɛm na ɛma wiase nyinaa nkɔmmɔ yɛ pɔtee na ɛyɛ mmerɛ.
press.assetsText: Logo, screenshots, ne prodɔkto mfonini (reba ntɛm).

careers.title: Adwuma
careers.intro: Yɛ yɛn ketewa kuɔmu a yɛresi kɔda mu, wiase nyinaa messenger. Sɛ wopɛ kɔda, wɔhaw-gyegye, ne fɛfɛɛfɛ a ɛyɛ anigye a, yɛpɛ wo.
careers.openRoles: Adwuma a etwa mu: Ɛnjiniani (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Prodɔkto, Mmoa.
careers.apply: Sɛn na wode bɛto so: Twerɛ w'apɛdeɛ/link kɔ jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Fa Chatforia ho
about.description: Chatforia yɛ kɔda, kasa pii mu messenger a ɛwɔ end-to-end kɔda, kyerɛase ntɛm, ne frɛ/video frɛ. Yɛn botae ne sɛ: mmoa nnipa ne wɔn ho—w'ahintasɛm mu, na kasa nyinaa mu.

values.control: Tumi wɔ wo nsɛm so: Nkratoɔ a ɛyera & kan-akan yɛ pɛ.

about.howDescription: Wɔde nkratoɔ kɔda efidie so ansa na ɛbɛkɔ. Kyerɛase, backups, ne afidie synk yɛde ayɛ na yɛn server renhu pii.

advertise.title: Bɔ dawuro wɔ Chatforia so
advertise.description: Du nkratoɔ akanyanfo de fɛfɛɛfɛ, brand-safe mmɔho. Yɛwɔ banɛɛ so, sponsɔship, ne ofie dawnload. Premiumfo renhu dawuro.

adsense.withPubId: Sɛesei yɛde Google AdSense na yɛma dawuro. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopɛ yɛn wɔ Google Ads mu a, fa publisher ID {{pubId}} na bisa managed placement wɔ yɛn units ase. Direct sponsɔship nso wɔ hɔ—fa fɔɔm no di dwuma.
adsense.noPubId: Sɛesei yɛde Google AdSense na yɛma dawuro. Direct sponsɔship nso wɔ hɔ—fa fɔɔm no di dwuma.

advertise.noPlacements: Ɔhyɛbea bi nni hɔ. Fa ka ho wɔ ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Sɛhyɛn pii ne bere tenten wɔ chat UI mu
why.brandSafe: Brand-safe fɔɔmat; dawuro dodow kɛse renyɛ
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsɔ meto (te sɛ “Start a Chat” modal) wɔ hɔ
why.deals: Direct deals anaa programmatic de AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Medase! Yɛahu wo asɛmmisa. Yɛbɛsan abɛka ho ntɛm.
form.missingRequired: Yɛsrɛ wo kɔ gu din, email, ne asɛmmisa no.
form.mailtoInfo: Wobue wo email so na wode asɛmmisa no bɛtɔ…
form.messagePlaceholder: Targeting, nna, KPI, ne placement apɛde…

legal.disclaimerStart: Sɛ wode to so a, wogye tom yɛn

upgrade.title: Sɔre (Upgrade)
upgrade.subtitle: Paw nhyehyɛe a ɛfata wo: fa dawuro firi so de Plus, anaa nya tumi nyinaa de Premium.

features.ringtones: Nsɛnka kɔkɔɔ ne nkratoɔ mu nneɛma

gettingStarted.title: Fi Ase
gettingStarted.subtitle: Woyɛ Chatforia foforo? Nhyehyɛe ntɛm yi bɛboa wo awie mprɛ.

alert.text: Yɛbɛto mu bio bere a yɛde nsafufuo no reba. Sɛ biribi nsɔ wo ani a, fa

section1.title: 1) Bɔ wo akawnt
section1.loginText: de wo akawnt a wowɔ dedaw.

section2.title: 2) Fi ase kasa
section2.item1: Yɛ DM anaa Group na fa wo nkratoɔ kɔ kan.
section2.item2: Fa kyerɛase ntɛm di nkɔmmɔ kasa 100+ mu.
section2.item3: Sɔ nkratoɔ a ɛyera ne kan-akan wɔ Profayl → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Kɔ anim
section3.item2Part1: Kɔtɔ afidie bio na hyɛ backups a wɔahyɛ-kode wɔ

account.q: Sɛnea mɛbɔ anaa masan anya me akawnt?
account.a: Fa app no anaa wɛb di dwuma, kɔ “Bɔ akawnt”, si wo email/fon mu. Sɛ wopɛ asan akɔ a, fa “Wewerɛ ehintasɛmfua”.

privacy.a: Yiw. Nkratoɔ ne frɛ yɛ end-to-end kɔda default. Wopɛ na wode na wokenkan.

translate.q: Kyerɛase ntɛm no yɛ dɛn di dwuma?
translate.a: Fa “Auto-translate” so wɔ Settings → Appearance & Language. Yɛkyerɛ ase efidie so baabi a ɛbɛtumi, anaa yɛnam banbɔ API so de data kakraa pɛ.

contact.a: Frɛ yɛn wɔ support@chatforia.com. Fa screenshots ne wo app version ka ho.

contact.title: Frɛ Yɛn
contact.successMsg: Medase—yɛn kurom bɛma wo email so mmuae.
contact.errorSend: Entumi annto. Yɛsrɛ wo, kɔ email: support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Privacy Polisi yi kyerɛ sɛnea Chatforia (“yɛn”, “yɛ”) boaboa, di dwuma, na kyɛ infɔmehyɛn bere a wode yɛn app ne asɛde yɛ adwuma. Yɛde Chatforia ayɛ na yede to dwuma sɛ yɛnhu pii.

infoWeCollect.title: Infɔmehyɛn a yɛboaboa
infoWeCollect.account: Akawnt infɔ (te sɛ email/fon) de si wo akawnt ne ban.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Nkratoɔ a wɔahyɛ-kode (nkratoɔ/frɛ) yɛ end-to-end; yɛrentumi nkenkan.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Asɛmmɔne/di dwuma te sɛ crash logs, efidie tebea, anaa analytics kakraa de yɛ nsakrae.

howWeUse.title: Sɛnea yɛde infɔmehyɛn di dwuma
howWeUse.provide: Ma asɛde no nsa ka na yɛmmoa (auth, spam/abuse nhwehwɛe).

sharing.title: Kyɛ
sharing.body: Yɛnntɔn data. Yɛbɛtumi akyɛ kakraa ma nnwumafo (te sɛ push/analytics) wɔ apam dennen so.

rights.title: Wo ho kwan
rights.body: Ɛda wo man so (te sɛ GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA) sɛ wobɛbisa kwan, nsakrae, pepade, anaa gyaw nhyehyɛe bi. Frɛ: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Sie-de & Banbɔ
retention.body: Yɛsie nea ɛho hia pɛ de ma adwuma. E2E nkratoɔ rentumi amfi kɔda mu.

children.title: Mmɔfra
children.body: Chatforia nndi dwuma mma mmɔfra a wodi mfe 13 awɔw (anaa wo mmara kyerɛ).

changes.title: Nsakrae
changes.body: Yɛbɛto nsakrae wɔ ha na yɛasan akyerɛ “Akyɛde a etwa mu” no.

intro.body: Sɛ wode Chatforia di dwuma a, wogye mmara yi tom. Sɛ wogye ntom a, mfa asɛde no nndi dwuma.

accounts.title: Akawnt
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Fa infɔ nokwaretofo na kora wo kɔkɔbɔ nne.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Woyɛ nea ɛto wo akawnt no mu adwuma no so hwɛfo.

acceptableUse.title: Sɛnea ɛfata de di dwuma
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Mmma mmara so atitiriw, basabasayɛ, anaa nea ɛhyɛ obi ho so; mmmma spam/auto-abuse.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Yɛbɛtumi agyae/asan ayi wo efiri so sɛ wode bɔne bɛyɛ.

yourContent.title: Wo nsɛm
yourContent.body: Wokura wo nsɛm ho tumi. Wode ho tumi ma yɛn kɛse a ɛho hia de ma adwuma (te sɛ routing, sie, kyerɛase).

disclaimer.title: Ahyɛde & fɛhaw ho ban
disclaimer.body: Asɛde no de “sɛnea ɛte” na yɛma no. Kɔntɔntrɛw kɛse kɔsi baabi a mmara ma, Chatforia rennya fɔ ama nsɛnnennen fɛhaw.

changes.title: Nsakrae
changes.body: Yɛbɛsan asesa mmara yi; sɛ wotoa so de di dwuma a, kyerɛ sɛ wogye tom.

doNotSell.title: Mfa Me Data Nnka Hɔ
doNotSell.body: Chatforia nntɔn data. Californiafo betumi asoma abisadeɛ wɔ CPRA ase de butɔnn ho asɛm ka.

cookies.title: Cookie Nsiesie
cookies.body: Chatforia de kuki kakraa pɛ di dwuma (te sɛ session, banbɔ). Yɛmpɛ adwumayɛfo kuki. Hwɛ wo browser nsiesie na hwɛ kuki so.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Fon nɔma bi nni hɔ. Fa area kɔd mu paw baako na fi ase sɛn nkratoɔ.

startChatModal.title: Fi ase chat
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Twerɛ din, din-kɔmu, fon, anaa email…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Fi chat ne wɔn a wapaw
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Twerɛ din-kɔmu anaa fon na pɛ “Hwehwɛ”.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Fon/email a wode bɛhyɛ bɛda hɔ bere a wode besie wɔ nkontakto mu.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Entumi annhyehyɛ chat ne wɔn a wopaw.

sounds.freeNotice: Woyɛ Free — nneɛma a ɛyɛ premium da hɔ nanso akɔkɔbɔ. Sɔre na bue nyinaa.

aiSettings.title: AI Nsiesie
aiSettings.controlIntro: Hwɛ kyerɛase, smart mmuae, ne ForiaBot auto-nsɛmmuae so.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Kyerɛase otomatik ama nkratoɔ a ɛreba
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Kyerɛ tete nsɛm ne nkyerɛaseɛ ka ho
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Fa nkratoɔ kakraa a wugyee (asiesɛm mu hɔhaw atwetwe) kɔ AI na ɛmmoa wo mmuae ntɛm.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Suma nsɛmmɔne wɔ AI mmuae mu
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Sɛ ɛwɔ so a, AI mmuae bɛsuma nsɛmmɔne a wɔahyɛ ho ban
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Ma auto-mmuae so bere a meyɛ busy
aiSettings.translateTagged: Bere a wɔde @translated anaa wɔaka me din pɛ
aiSettings.translateAll: Kyerɛase ama nkratoɔ a ɛreba nyinaa
aiSettings.modeMention: Bere a wɔde @ka me din pɛ

accessibilitySettings.title: Wɔhaw-gyegye & Ankaeɛ
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Nkwanhyɛ a ɛma Chatforia yɛ mmerɛ sɛ wuntie.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Fi normal so. Ma so bere a wopɛ akɛseɛ kɛse wɔ wɔhaw-gyegye mu.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Anibre (visual) ankaeɛ ama nkratoɔ & frɛ
Kyerɛ bannɛ ne title bɔ atɔ so na merenhwere adwuma.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Ma efidie nshi bere a nkratoɔ foforo ba (sɛ ɛsɔ mu)
Ma efidie no nshi bere a ankaeɛ ba.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Ma ekran no hyerɛn bere a frɛ rekɔto
Ekran bɛhyerɛn kakraa bere a frɛ reba.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Kyerew nea wɔkae otomatik
Fa nkyerɛwtoaso ka audio nkratoɔ a wugye ho.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Kyerɛ bannɛ ne title bɔ atɔ so na merenhwere adwuma.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Ma efidie nshi bere a nkratoɔ foforo ba (sɛ ɛsɔ mu)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Ma efidie no nshi bere a ankaeɛ ba.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Ma ekran hyerɛn bere a frɛ reba
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Ekran bɛhyerɛn kakraa bere a frɛ reba.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Sie ciphertext nko ara wɔ server so. Eyi yi AI/Kyerɛase ne moderation animhwɛ.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Hwehwɛ alias, din, din-kɔmu, anaa fon so
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Akwankyerɛ kakraa na woasi mu ntɛm.
peoplePage.findOrAdd: Hwehwɛ anaa fa obi ka ho
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Kyɛ wo invite link na fi ase nkɔmmɔ ntɛm.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Tenatena so de Chatforia iOS ne Android so.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tip: Wo nkratoɔ gyina pintinn wɔ wɛb ne mobayl so.

randomChat.title: Chat Kwantuni
randomChat.description: Hyia onipa foforo ntɛm. Yɛbɛhyɛ mo na yɛabue chat room a ɛtwa mu.
randomChat.saveGuard: Wobetumi asie nkɔmmɔ a ɛyɛ onipa–kɔ–onipa pɛ
